csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <group prefix="(" suffix=").">
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year"/>
        </date>
        <choose>
          <if type="book chapter article-journal" match="none">
            <date variable="issued">
              <date-part prefix=", " name="month"/>
              <date-part prefix=" " name="day"/>
            </date>
          </if>
        </choose>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
